com.soa.agent
Interface MessageContext

public interface MessageContext

Holds the context of a call to the agent. The context consists primarily of a message an other information describing that message or the conditions in which that message is being delivered.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getBindingURI()
          Returns the type of binding (SOAP 1.1, SOAP 1.2, HTTP, etc.) being used (if any and known).
 java.lang.String getInterfaceName()
          Returns the name of the interface being invoked (if known).
